issue.title: [C#] Add unit tests for "Types" in arrow/csharp
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4620](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4620). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Arrow/cpp has tests for "Types" under type-test.cc. Port all applicable tests to the csharp implementation
